1: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>unto Joshua</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּירָ֣א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>Fear</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תֵּחָ֔ת <sup>2865 </sup> <n>not neither be thou dismayed</n> קַ֣ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>take</n> עִמְּךָ֗ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אֵ֚ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עַ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>all the people</n> הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of war</n> וְק֖וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>with thee and arise</n> עֲלֵ֣ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>go up</n> הָעָ֑י <sup>5857 </sup> <n>to Ai</n> רְאֵ֣ה ׀ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>see</n> נָתַ֣תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I have given</n> בְיָדְךָ֗ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into thy hand</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מֶ֤לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> הָעַי֙ <sup>5857 </sup> <n>of Ai</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמּ֔וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and his people</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עִיר֖וֹ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and his city</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and his land</n>
2: וְעָשִׂ֨יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And thou shalt do</n> לָעַ֜י <sup>5857 </sup> <n>to Ai</n> וּלְמַלְכָּ֗הּ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>and her king</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> עָשִׂ֤יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>as thou didst</n> לִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <sup>3405 </sup> <n>unto Jericho</n> וּלְמַלְכָּ֔הּ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>and her king</n> רַק־ <sup>7535 </sup> <n>its</n> שְׁלָלָ֥הּ <sup>7998 </sup> <n>only the spoil</n> וּבְהֶמְתָּ֖הּ <sup>929 </sup> <n>thereof and the cattle</n> תָּבֹ֣זּוּ <sup>962 </sup> <n>thereof shall ye take for a prey</n> לָכֶ֑ם שִׂים־ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>unto yourselves lay</n> לְךָ֥ אֹרֵ֛ב <sup>693 </sup> <n>thee an ambush</n> לָעִ֖יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>for the city</n> מֵאַחֲרֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>310 </sup> <n>behind</n>
3: וַיָּ֧קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>arose</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>So Joshua</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> עַ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all the people</n> הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of war</n> לַעֲל֣וֹת <sup>5927 </sup> <n>to go up</n> הָעָ֑י <sup>5857 </sup> <n>against Ai</n> וַיִּבְחַ֣ר <sup>977 </sup> <n>chose out</n> יְ֠הוֹשֻׁעַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>and Joshua</n> שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>thirty</n> אֶ֤לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> אִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <sup>1368 </sup> <n>mighty</n> הַחַ֔יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>of valour</n> וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֖ם <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and sent them away</n> לָֽיְלָה׃ <sup>3915 </sup> <n>by night</n>
4: וַיְצַ֨ו <sup>6680 </sup> <n>And he commanded</n> אֹתָ֜ם <sup>853 </sup> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>them saying</n> רְ֠אוּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אַתֶּ֞ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> אֹרְבִ֤ים <sup>693 </sup> <n>ye shall lie in wait</n> לָעִיר֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>against the city</n> מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <sup>310 </sup> <n>[even] behind</n> הָעִ֔יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּרְחִ֥יקוּ <sup>7368 </sup> <n>far</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> הָעִ֖יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>from the city</n> מְאֹ֑ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>not very</n> וִהְיִיתֶ֥ם <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כֻּלְּכֶ֖ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> נְכֹנִֽים׃ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>but be ye all ready</n>
5: וַאֲנִ֗י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And I and all the people</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אִתִּ֔י <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> נִקְרַ֖ב <sup>7126 </sup> <n>that [are] with me will approach</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הָעִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>unto the city</n> וְהָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>and when</n> יֵצְא֤וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and it shall come to pass when they come out</n> לִקְרָאתֵ֙נוּ֙ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>against</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֔ה <sup>7223 </sup> <n>us as at the first</n> וְנַ֖סְנוּ <sup>5127 </sup> <n>that we will flee</n> לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n>
6: וְיָצְא֣וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>(For they will come out</n> אַחֲרֵ֗ינוּ <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> עַ֣ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> הַתִּיקֵ֤נוּ <sup>5423 </sup> <n>us) till we have drawn</n> אוֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָעִ֔יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>them from the city</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>for they will say</n> נָסִ֣ים <sup>5127 </sup> <n>They flee</n> לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>us</n> בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <sup>7223 </sup> <n>us as at the first</n> וְנַ֖סְנוּ <sup>5127 </sup> <n>therefore we will flee</n> לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n>
7: וְאַתֶּ֗ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>and you</n> תָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Then ye shall rise up</n> מֵהָ֣אוֹרֵ֔ב <sup>693 </sup> <n>from the ambush</n> וְהוֹרַשְׁתֶּ֖ם <sup>3423 </sup> <n>and seize</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>upon the city</n> וּנְתָנָ֛הּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>will deliver</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>it into your hand</n>
8: וְהָיָ֞ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְּתָפְשְׂכֶ֣ם <sup>8610 </sup> <n>And it shall be when ye have taken</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעִ֗יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n> תַּצִּ֤יתוּ <sup>3341 </sup> <n>[that] ye shall set</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעִיר֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n> בָּאֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>on fire</n> כִּדְבַ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>according to the commandment</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shall ye do</n> רְא֖וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>See</n> צִוִּ֥יתִי <sup>6680 </sup> <n>I have commanded</n> אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup>
9: וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֣ם <sup>7971 </sup> <n>therefore sent them forth</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>Joshua</n> וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמַּאְרָ֔ב <sup>3993 </sup> <n>to lie in ambush</n> וַיֵּשְׁב֗וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and abode</n> בֵּ֧ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> בֵּֽית־ אֵ֛ל <sup>1008 </sup> <n>between Bethel</n> וּבֵ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> הָעַ֖י <sup>5857 </sup> <n>and Ai</n> מִיָּ֣ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>on the west side</n> לָעָ֑י <sup>5857 </sup> <n>of Ai</n> וַיָּ֧לֶן <sup>3885 </sup> <n>lodged</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>but Joshua</n> בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>that night</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בְּת֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n> הָעָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n>
10: וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֤ם <sup>7925 </sup> <n>rose up early</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>And Joshua</n> בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>in the morning</n> וַיִּפְקֹ֖ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>and numbered</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעָ֑ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> וַיַּ֨עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and went up</n> ה֜וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְזִקְנֵ֧י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>he and the elders</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> הָעָֽי׃ <sup>5857 </sup> <n>to Ai</n>
11: וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָ֨ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And all the people</n> הַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>[even the people] of war</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אִתּ֗וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> עָלוּ֙ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>that [were] with him went up</n> וַֽיִּגְּשׁ֔וּ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>and drew nigh</n> וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and came</n> נֶ֣גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>front</n> הָעִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>before the city</n> וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <sup>2583 </sup> <n>and pitched</n> מִצְּפ֣וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>on the north side</n> לָעַ֔י <sup>5857 </sup> <n>of Ai</n> וְהַגַּ֖י <sup>1516 </sup> <n>now [there was] a valley</n> [בֵּינֹו כ] (בֵּינָ֥יו <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> ק) וּבֵין־ <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> הָעָֽי׃ <sup>5857 </sup> <n>between them and Ai</n>
12: וַיִּקַּ֕ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>And he took</n> כַּחֲמֵ֥שֶׁת <sup>2568 </sup> <n>about five</n> אֲלָפִ֖ים <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> אִ֑ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and set</n> אוֹתָ֜ם <sup>853 </sup> אֹרֵ֗ב <sup>693 </sup> <n>them to lie in ambush</n> בֵּ֧ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> בֵּֽית־ אֵ֛ל <sup>1008 </sup> <n>between Bethel</n> וּבֵ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> הָעַ֖י <sup>5857 </sup> <n>and Ai</n> מִיָּ֥ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>on the west side</n> לָעִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n>
13: וַיָּשִׂ֨ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>And when they had set</n> הָעָ֜ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>[even] all the host</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>that was</n> מִצְּפ֣וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>that [was] on the north</n> לָעִ֔יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲקֵב֖וֹ <sup>6119 </sup> <n>and their liers in wait</n> מִיָּ֣ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>on the west</n> לָעִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>spent</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>Joshua</n> בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>that night</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בְּת֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>into the midst</n> הָעֵֽמֶק׃ <sup>6010 </sup> <n>of the valley</n>
14: וַיְהִ֞י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> כִּרְא֣וֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when the king</n> הָעַ֗י <sup>5857 </sup> <n>of Ai</n> וַֽיְמַהֲר֡וּ <sup>4116 </sup> <n>[it] that they hasted</n> וַיַּשְׁכִּ֡ימוּ <sup>7925 </sup> <n>and rose up early</n> וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <sup>582 </sup> <n>and the men</n> הָעִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> לִקְרַֽאת־ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>against</n> יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> לַֽמִּלְחָמָ֞ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>to battle</n> ה֧וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> עַמּ֛וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>he and all his people</n> לַמּוֹעֵ֖ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>at a time appointed</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הָֽעֲרָבָ֑ה <sup>6160 </sup> <n>the plain</n> וְהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָדַ֔ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>but he wist</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֹרֵ֥ב <sup>693 </sup> <n>not that [there were] liers in ambush</n> ל֖וֹ מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <sup>310 </sup> <n>against him behind</n> הָעִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n>
15: וַיִּנָּֽגְע֛וּ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>made as if they were beaten</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>And Joshua</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and all Israel</n> לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <sup>5127 </sup> <n>them and fled</n> דֶּ֥רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>by the way</n> הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <sup>4057 </sup> <n>of the wilderness</n>
16: וַיִּזָּעֲק֗וּ <sup>2199 </sup> <n>were called</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And all the people</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> [בָּעִיר כ] (בָּעַ֔י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n> ק) לִרְדֹּ֖ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>together to pursue</n> אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> וַֽיִּרְדְּפוּ֙ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>them and they pursued</n> אַחֲרֵ֣י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>Joshua</n> וַיִּנָּתְק֖וּ <sup>5423 </sup> <n>and were drawn away</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>were in</n> הָעִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>from the city</n>
17: וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נִשְׁאַ֣ר <sup>7604 </sup> <n>left</n> אִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And there was not a man</n> בָּעַי֙ <sup>5857 </sup> <n>in Ai</n> וּבֵ֣ית אֵ֔ל <sup>1008 </sup> <n>or Bethel</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>had not</n> יָצְא֖וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>that went not out</n> אַחֲרֵ֣י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> וַיַּעַזְב֤וּ <sup>5800 </sup> <n>and they left</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעִיר֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n> פְּתוּחָ֔ה <sup>6605 </sup> <n>open</n> וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֖וּ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>and pursued</n> אַחֲרֵ֥י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>after Israel</n> פ
